name: about_you
label: About You
help: First off let's find out who you are. If completing a form like this is difficult for you to manage please get in touch via applications@thecodersguild.org.uk and we will arrange an alternative way for you to apply.

email.label: Email
email.help: don't worry, we're not going to spam you
email.required_message: A valid email address is required.

phone_number.label: Phone Number
phone_number.help: If we need any clarification with your application it is quicker for us to text you.

pronouns.label: Pronouns
pronouns.help: Help us to address you properly

nationality.label: Nationality
nationality.help: Help us to assess your eligibility for the course by selecting one of the following options

residential_status.label: Residential Status
residential_status.help: Have you resided in the UK or EEA for the last 3 years?
residential_status.required_message: This question is required to assess your eligibility

limited_leave.label: Limited Leave
limited_leave.help: Do you have limited leave in the UK?

opportunity.label: Which vacancy are you applying for?
opportunity.help: If you have come here via the .gov find an apprenticeship site or a job board the vacancy will be for a specific organisation - if not applicable just leave this blank

name: application
label: Application Questions
help: This course is not right for everyone - these questions will help us make a judgement on whether this pilot course is the right learning path for you. If you are unsuccessful we will still be able to point you to other resources and programmes. Please fill out the questions to the best of your ability.

completed_before.label: Have you completed an apprenticeship before?

why_did_user_apply.label: What has made you apply for this course?
why_did_user_apply.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

testing_experience.label: Do you have any experience in software testing? If so, can you tell us about it? (optional)
testing_experience.help: This question is optional but if you choose to answer please make sure it is less that 200 words

website_example.label: Can you tell us about a time when you were frustrated by software/app, and what did you do about it?
website_example.help: More than 50 but less than 200 words please :)

name: demographic_data
label: Demographic Data
help: The DfE (who are paying for the course) have to ask it. All of this data will be held securely and will only be used for anoymous data processsing and evaluation. Feel free to choose the prefer not to say option on any questions you don't feel like answering and please don't let it put you off. For more details please see our privacy policy.

education.label: What's the highest level of Education you have completed?

2.name: Secondary School /  GCSE - with grades 3, 2, 1 or grades D, E, F, G (or similar)

3.name: Secondary School / GCSE - with grades c and above/ 4 and above

disabilities.label: Do you consider yourself to have a disability / long term health condition?
disabilities.other_text: Let us know about any adjustments you may need to fulfil your role

ethnicity.label: Ethnicity
ethnicity.other_text: Please provide us with your ethnicity

name: eligibility
label: Are you eligible for funding?
help: This course is Gov funded and FREE for you - so obviously there is paperwork for us to complete. We need this information to be able to progress your application so please don't leave any out.

employment_eligability.label: Do you have the right to work in the UK?

residence.label: Do you have permanent residency in the UK?

occupation.label: Occupation
occupation.help: What is your current job title (if applicable)

employer.label: Who is your current employer?
employer.help: Please enter the name of your current employer (if applicable)

address.label: What is your full residential address?

name: one_more_thing
label: Finally
help: It really helps us if you let us know what bits of our social media and marketing are working :)

reference.label: Where did you hear about this?
reference.other_text: Where did you hear about this?

terms.label: Have you read the terms and conditions?
options: I have read and understand the terms and conditions
terms.required_message: You must confirm you have read and understood the terms and conditions

privacy.label: Have you read the privacy policy?
options: I have read and understand the privacy policy
privacy.required_message: You must confirm you have read and understood the privacy policy

dfe_opt_in.label: Dept for Education Research (opt in)
dfe_opt_in.help: Do you consent to being contacted by a third party research contractor (commissioned by DfE) to be invited to participate in interviews and surveys to help us understand your experience of the course and any improvements we can make to future courses? Participation in such research is entirely voluntary and consent can be withdrawn at any time.
options: Please tick the box if you are willing to be contacted.
